attributes.action: Reinstate Capital Punishment, for crimes against children
attributes.background: Hold a Referendum on bringing back the death penalty for crimes against children, as there would be a huge majority of the population in favour.

rejection.details:
We understand you want a referendum to be held on the question of whether to re-introduce the death penalty, however it's not clear what 'crimes against children' you want this to apply to.

We already have a petition open calling for a very similar action, which you might like to sign:

'Hold a referendum on whether to reinstate the death penalty': https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/602435
